title: Prime Bella - Rajagiriya
details:
Sri Lanka's Flagship brand in Real Estate, Prime Group, yet again unveils another impressive project In Rajagiriya, making it truly affordable and giving hope to all customers who wants to settle with nothing than the best!

Facing the main street of Madinnagoda from just 1.5Km from Rajagriya city surrounded with greenery and beautiful lake. A convenient location with everything a srilankan expect from luxury to value.

Call us on +94 710 666 444 for early bird bookings!
